name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum 1oz
description: The ultra-hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum - your ultimate savior from dry, dehydrated, and flaky skin! Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to deeply moisturize your skin, this powerful serum is the key to lasting hydration throughout the day and well into the night. Essential for all skin types, our serum can be applied after your daily skincare routine or even used periodically throughout the day. Say goodbye to dryness and flakiness and say hello to softer, healthier, and more supple skin! Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum.
